articles.title: First on CNN: US Military investigating whether US service member carried out an insider attack on base in Syria that injured 4 Americans - CNN
articles.description: The US military is investigating whether an American service member set off explosives in an insider attack on a small US base in northern Syria that injured four service members in April, according to three defense officials and a statement from the military.
